The question concerning this remnant of the flesh is— ‘ should we continue in it, or live therein ‘?’ That is—‘ ought a Christian man to indulge in the works of the flesh, or those sins which proceed from remaining corruption, in order that the grace of God may be the more illustriously displayed by their remission in Christ?' The answer of the apostle is ‘ by no means: for we are dead to the flesh through J esus Christ, that we should not walk in the works thereof.’
